Does it have more records to fetch?

source.name: Check if the query has moreData

properties.jslt-transform-transformation:
{
  "trialbalance": [
    for (.response.items)
    let opening_debit   = if (.op_dr) number(.op_dr) else 0
    let opening_credit   = if (.op_cr) number(.op_cr) else 0
    let closing_debit   = if (.closing_debit) number(.closing_debit) else 0
    let closing_credit  = if (.closing_credit) number(.closing_credit) else 0
    let transaction_debit   = if (.trnx_dr) number(.trnx_dr) else 0
    let transaction_credit   = if (.trnx_cr) number(.trnx_cr) else 0
    let transaction     = $transaction_debit - $transaction_credit
    let raw_endbalance  = $closing_debit - $closing_credit
    let endbalance      = round($raw_endbalance * 100) / 100
    let raw_startbalance = $opening_debit - $opening_credit
    let startbalance      = round($raw_startbalance * 100) / 100
   {
      "glcode":         .acctnumber,
      "transaction":    $transaction,
      "audit_entries":  0,
      "closing_amount": $endbalance,
      "opening_amount": $startbalance,
      "location":       .subsidiaryname,
      "currency":       "dollar"
    }
  ]
}

processors.name: Check if the query has moreData
Does it have more records to fetch?

parameters.description: Account token to enable comms with Merge API
parameters.name: account_token

parameters.description: Collection to save the activity logs.
parameters.name: collection

parameters.description: Root directory to pick the record
parameters.name: config_directory

parameters.description: DB query to pick the trialbalance
parameters.name: db_query
parameters.value: {"q":"SELECT TL.subsidiary, TAL.account, acc.acctnumber, SUM(TAL.DEBIT) CLOSING_DEBIT, SUM(TAL.CREDIT) CLOSING_CREDIT, NVL(TRNX.TRNX_DR, 0) TRNX_DR, NVL(TRNX.TRNX_CR, 0) TRNX_CR, SUM(TAL.DEBIT) - NVL(TRNX.TRNX_DR, 0) AS OP_DR, SUM(TAL.CREDIT) - NVL(TRNX.TRNX_CR, 0) AS OP_CR FROM transaction TR INNER JOIN transactionLine TL ON TR.ID = TL.transaction INNER JOIN TransactionAccountingLine TAL ON TL.ID = TAL.transactionline AND TAL.transaction = TL.transaction LEFT JOIN account ACC ON TAL.account = ACC.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TL.subsidiary AS TRNX_SUBSIDIARY, TAL.account AS TRNX_ACCOUNT, SUM(TAL.DEBIT) AS TRNX_DR, SUM(TAL.CREDIT) AS TRNX_CR FROM transaction TR INNER JOIN transactionLine TL ON TR.ID = TL.transaction INNER JOIN TransactionAccountingLine TAL ON TL.ID = TAL.transactionline AND TAL.transaction = TL.transaction LEFT JOIN account ACC ON TAL.account = ACC.ID WHERE TR.trandate >= '06/01/2025' AND TR.trandate <= '06/30/2025' AND TAL.amount IS NOT NULL AND TR.posting = 'T' AND TL.subsidiary = 3 GROUP BY TL.subsidiary, TAL.account ORDER BY TL.subsidiary, TAL.account) TRNX ON TRNX.TRNX_SUBSIDIARY = TL.subsidiary AND TRNX.TRNX_ACCOUNT = TAL.account WHERE TR.trandate <= '06/30/2025' AND TAL.amount IS NOT NULL AND TR.posting = 'T' AND TL.subsidiary = 3 GROUP BY TL.subsidiary, TAL.account, acc.acctnumber, TRNX.TRNX_DR, TRNX.TRNX_CR ORDER BY TL.subsidiary, acc.acctnumber;"}, "request_format": "JSON" }

parameters.description: Config file name for trial balance
parameters.name: filename
